issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

components.name: Studio
components.description: Please enter tickets related to Titanium Studio here.

fields.description:
when we do clean project and start Project Build the Appcelerator Studio shows that it indexes "/iphone/hyperloop/..." or "/android/hyperloop/..." and after 30 min the system throws memory error

I have disabled the hyperloop in my project and also I am not using hyperloop

please check the attached issue image
fields.summary: Appcelerator Studio 6.0 Project Build Process Slow and Stuck
fields.environment:
Mac OSX 10.14.6
Xcode 11.3.1
Appcelerator Studio 6.0.0
Titanium SDK 9.0.0
